originalText.text: Silly billy was literally the best!!! We hired him so my sons 7th bday party and he entertained the entire room. As an adult I was surprised by his tricks! He left everyone laughing and amazed. My son enjoyed his party!! Thank you so much from the bottom of my heart. Book him and no other of you want a great magician

text.text: Silly billy was literally the best!!! We hired him so my sons 7th bday party and he entertained the entire room. As an adult I was surprised by his tricks! He left everyone laughing and amazed. My son enjoyed his party!! Thank you so much from the bottom of my heart. Book him and no other of you want a great magician

originalText.text:
We, all, loved Silly Billy! My son turned 4 and Silly Billy made him feel special at his party. So effortlessly great with kids and the right kind of fun for their age. The kids were laughing and cheering the whole time. Parents were very into the show, too. Silly Billy was very easy to communicate with and I loved how he kept everyone engaged.
We were very pleased with his show, had a great party and will definitely keep him in mind for future events.

text.text:

originalText.text: The best performer for kids party! I have had Silly Billy in two different kids birthday party for 3 and 5 year old. Both occasions the kids ( and their parents ) were laughing out loud and having so much fun with Silly Billy. He truly can captivate the kids imaginations and keep them seated for 45 minutes ! I highly recommend him to any kids party !

originalText.text: Silly Billy came to our son's 5th birthday party which we held in our local park.  For 45 minutes, the kids could barely breathe for laughing so much!  He was such a huge hit!  Parents are telling me 10 days later that their kids are still talking about Silly Billy.  Communication was super easy, professional and prompt and everything was so easy to arrange.

originalText.text: Highly recommendable! Our son who turned 8 and all his friends had such a great time, laughing and screaming all the time. He nailed the age group and  the years of experience really showed, he needed no help from us parents. We had a great time, too! Thanks again, Silly Billy!
